subject: feat: add app header with tabs for Boring CV and Cool Story
body:
- Replace old footer-based layout with a sticky header showing
  "see-veo (CV oh!)" title and install/manual-install buttons
- Add tab navigation between "Boring CV" (existing CV content)
  and "Cool Story" (placeholder for now)
- Active tab uses background color match for a connected-panel look
- Footer simplified to just copyright

https://claude.ai/code/session_01GRU82B1cQNnm31qQisoxYv
title: add app header with tabs for Boring CV and Cool Story
